Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: The restaurant had a nice atmosphere and very good service. The waiters were always available and explained the whole menu. We got two pasta dishes. From those two, only the lasagne did not meet my expectations, as I found the sauce very heavy and overcooked. The second dish was very tasty. Also, their Pinot grigio wine was tasty.

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Great experience, one my favourite restaurants in the pijp. Great service, delicious food and cosy atmosphere. Perfect for a romantic dinner. The tagliatelle with white truffle were perfect and the tarte tatin was devine!

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Oysters and cava with best terrace view for watching the hustle and bustle of the Van Woustraat, an excellent 4-course menu changing every week if you don‚Äôt want to choose from the a la carte menu, as you have eaten it all yet as coming back very often..

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: First time was good. Second time was average. For the price quality ration not sure I want to test it three times. Ordered the fried spiering which was ok but hard to find inside a forest of arugula (which is not even mentioned on the dish) ‚Ä¶

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: This place has delicious Italian food on its menu. Don't think standard pastas or pizzas though. Absolutely loved the ravioli and gnocchi. Combined with some great red wine, a good atmosphere and nice service, I can truly recommend it.

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: I walked in without a reservation on a Monday night, without a reservation, and felt warmly welcomed and treated well (as a single diner!). I had a SHOCKINGLY enjoyable meal of fish soup and Jerusalem Artichoke  ravioli. The service was just fine, the food great, and the atmosphere warm and relaxing. I loved this place.

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Great neighbourhood restaurant. Come with a date, a group or alone and share the big communal table or sit at the bar. Whilst living here my favourite thing to do on a Sunday was walk up to the pijp, take in some shops and then come here ‚Ä¶

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Delicious food, nice atmosphere between brasserie and Bruin cafe. Good service and a lively ambience. There is a sucking pig on the menue that you have to order 4 days in advance for a big group. Definitely going to try that next time.

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Charming waiter! We had a 4 course menu and each dish was incredible, in particular the croquettes and chicken. Very comfortable surroundings and atmosphere, would highly recommend!

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Great food - the rib eye is especially good, and the pasta is excellent.  It's probably all good.  Very friendly too.  Have been a few times before and will be going back!

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Excellent Italian food, compliments for the original menu. Good atmosphere and 'service with a smile'. During peak hours a bit crowded, tables should be just a little less close to each other.

Name: Firma Pekelharing
Review Text: Food is super greasy, very oily and salads or pastas are mixing up totally irrelevant ingredients. Personnel is quite pretentious, and the menu is expensive for what it is. It‚Äôs not a Mediterranean place, it‚Äôs some kind of Dutch restaurant ‚Ä¶
